title: How to Make a Vegan Banana Mug Cake

methods.name: Making a Basic Banana Mug Cake

steps.headline: Mix the vanilla extract with the almond milk and sunflower oil in a mug.
Mash the half banana with a fork.
steps.description: Add it to the liquid mixture in the mug and mix well.

steps.headline: Sieve the flour and sugar into a bowl and add it to the mug.
Mix the ingredients well with a fork or spoon in a mug until it forms a paste.
Microwave the ingredients for two minutes.
steps.description: Take the mug out the microwave and stick a skewer in. If the skewer comes out with batter put it back in the microwave for a further 10-20 seconds.

steps.headline: Garnish with vegan cream or the other half of the banana cut into slices.

text:
Making a Basic Banana Mug Cake Mix the vanilla extract with the almond milk and sunflower oil in a mug.  Mash the half banana with a fork. Add it to the liquid mixture in the mug and mix well. Sieve the flour and sugar into a bowl and add it to the mug.  Mix the ingredients well with a fork or spoon in a mug until it forms a paste.  Microwave the ingredients for two minutes. Take the mug out the microwave and stick a skewer in. If the skewer comes out with batter put it back in the microwave for a further 10-20 seconds. Garnish with vegan cream or the other half of the banana cut into slices. Enjoy! Making an Oatmeal Banana Mug Cake [3]
